QuestData.Title: More than Coincidence
QuestData.Description: We've gleaned as much as we can from the ruins of the inn. I'm concerned about where the investigation will lead us from here, but we must know the truth.$B$BBetween the hoofprints and the shield with Mosarn's mark, I'm led to believe that the Grimtotems may have been involved. They've recently established a settlement in the swamp, Blackhoof Village to the northeast. Travel to Blackhoof Village and search for more arms of Mosarn's manufacture.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 7 Blackhoof Armaments from Blackhoof Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: What did your search of Blackhoof Village reveal?
QuestData.RewardText: <Krog inspects the weapons and armor you've brought from Blackhoof Village.>$B$BThis is unmistakably the work of Mosarn. Questioning him further may draw too much attention, but we have a bit more freedom in dealing with the Grimtotems.
